1622981436_1Hkb9FSSux5SJFvuaQ5SKFnievTuj.body:

you are in full denial... in two stage :

1. if you want all of this, interfering with my own pursuing of happyness, by reducing my disposal income through taxation, you should go live in venezuela... more more more, for free, doesn't work, robots or not. the problem you will face is allocation, who decides, and I guess a bigger yachts for the decision makers. but that's not really disturbing, as you must be of a lower intellect, even if the formalism of your reply is excellent.

2. what distrub me really, is your lack of understanding of the situation, you want freebies... as most people always sought, and as expected by the founders of the republic : what about pedogate? you find normal and natural that vips could train children to become their sex slaves and get scott free, not even a little interview with the fbi? you find normal that building free fall on the ground, that 2 wars were launched because of that, and still no one knows what happen to WTC 7, how it was pre mined? You find normal that hitlary emails, fundations shenigans, and others activites (haiti children) have never been investigated? You find normal that a regime change military style was done against the Republic? That a war on plants is being waged? that autism, or allergies (vaxx grown on peanuts proteins) are exponentializing or that gmo salmon, glypho, or carabadina (the new one from glypho burning the soil) are released? you find normal that EMA for untested vaxx are allowed when ivermeticine or hcq are widely available and 99.999999999% safe? 

and among all of this you want freebies? that's why venezuela collapsed. you don't give a shit about accountablity (who will pay your free freebies, even less understand distribution of said free feebies) and even less for real issues...

you are a shame to the republic > to the c17, you will learn to swim or die. I know it's brutal, but if the indians were genocided, there is no reason for you to remain.
